00052   typedef map<std::string, std::string> ml_tlm2_socket_map_type;

00059   // nb transport fw/bw item mapping
00060   typedef map<unsigned int,tlm_generic_payload*>   ml_tlm2_transaction_mapping_map_type; 
00061   typedef map<tlm_generic_payload*,unsigned int>   ml_tlm2_id_mapping_map_type; 
00062   typedef map<std::string, bool>                   ml_tlm2_disable_transaction_mapping_map_type; 
00063 
00064   ml_tlm2_transaction_mapping_map_type           ml_tlm2_transaction_mapping_map;
00065   ml_tlm2_id_mapping_map_type                    ml_tlm2_id_mapping_map; 
00066   ml_tlm2_disable_transaction_mapping_map_type   ml_tlm2_disable_transaction_mapping_map;

00068 void ml_tlm2_do_register_target(const std::string &target_socket_name, const std::string &transactor_name) {
00069     ml_tlm2_target_socket_map[target_socket_name] = target_socket_name;
00070 }
00071 
00072 void ml_tlm2_do_register_initiator(const std::string &initiator_socket_name, const std::string &transactor_name) {
00073     ml_tlm2_init_socket_map[initiator_socket_name] = initiator_socket_name;
00074 }

00076 extern void uvm_ml_do_connect (std::string port_name, std::string export_name);
00077 
00078 bool ml_tlm2_check_cross_registration(const std::string & initiator_socket_name, const std::string & target_socket_name) { 
00079     if (ml_tlm2_target_socket_map[initiator_socket_name] != "") {
00080         string err_str = "In uvm_ml_connect(): The first argument (initiator socket path) '" + initiator_socket_name + "' was registered with ML_TLM2_REGISTER_TARGET";
00081         SC_REPORT_FATAL("Error", err_str.c_str());
00082         return false;
00083     }
00084     else if (ml_tlm2_init_socket_map[target_socket_name] != "") {
00085         string err_str = "In uvm_ml_connect(): The second argument (target socket path) '" + target_socket_name + "' was registered with ML_TLM2_REGISTER_INITIATOR";
00086         SC_REPORT_FATAL("Error", err_str.c_str());
00087         return false;
00088     }
00089     return true;
00090 }
00091 
00092 void ml_tlm2_map_transaction(tlm_generic_payload * tlm_gp, unsigned int & transaction_id) {  
00093   // assign id if needed
00094   if (transaction_id == ML_TLM2_UNINITIALIZED_ID) {
00095     transaction_id = uvm_ml_utils::assign_transaction_id();
00096   }
00097   ml_tlm2_transaction_mapping_map[transaction_id] = tlm_gp;
00098   ml_tlm2_id_mapping_map[tlm_gp] = transaction_id;
00099   tlm_gp->acquire();
00100 }
00101   
00102 tlm_generic_payload *ml_tlm2_get_transaction_by_id(unsigned int id) {    
00103   map<unsigned int,tlm_generic_payload*>::iterator it = ml_tlm2_transaction_mapping_map.find(id);
00104   if (it == ml_tlm2_transaction_mapping_map.end()) {
00105     return 0;
00106   } else {
00107     return it->second;
00108   };
00109 }
00110 
00111 unsigned int ml_tlm2_get_id_by_transaction(tlm_generic_payload &trans) {
00112   map<tlm_generic_payload*, unsigned int>::iterator it = ml_tlm2_id_mapping_map.find(&trans);
00113   if (it == ml_tlm2_id_mapping_map.end()) {
00114     return ML_TLM2_UNINITIALIZED_ID;
00115   } else {
00116     return it->second;
00117   };
00118 }
00119 
00120 bool ml_tlm2_release_transaction(tlm_generic_payload * gp_ptr, unsigned int & transaction_id) {    
00121   //assert(gp_ptr != 0);
00122   if(gp_ptr == 0) {
00123     char msg[1024];
00124     sprintf(msg, "\nTransaction ID is '%d'\n", transaction_id);
00125     UVM_ML_SC_REPORT_ERROR("UVM-SC adapter: ml_tlm2_release_transaction failed due to null pointer",msg);
00126     return false;
00127   };
00128   int result = ml_tlm2_id_mapping_map.erase(gp_ptr);
00129   if (result == 0) {
00130     return false;
00131   }
00132   result = ml_tlm2_transaction_mapping_map.erase(transaction_id);  
00133   if (result == 0) {
00134     return false;
00135   }  
00136   gp_ptr->release();  
00137   transaction_id = ML_TLM2_UNINITIALIZED_ID;
00138   return true;
00139 }
00140 
00141 void ml_tlm2_turn_off_transaction_mapping(const char* socket_name) {
00142   ml_tlm2_disable_transaction_mapping_map[socket_name] = true;
00143 }
00144 
00145 bool ml_tlm2_transaction_mapping_disabled(const string &socket_name) {
00146   if (ml_tlm2_disable_transaction_mapping_map.find(socket_name) == ml_tlm2_disable_transaction_mapping_map.end())
00147     return false;
00148   else
00149     return ml_tlm2_disable_transaction_mapping_map[socket_name];
00150 }
00151 
00152 const char* ml_tlm2_phase_to_string(tlm_phase phase) {
00153   switch (phase) {
00154   case BEGIN_REQ:
00155     return (const char*)"BEGIN_REQ";
00156   case END_REQ:
00157     return (const char*)"END_REQ";
00158   case BEGIN_RESP:
00159     return (const char*)"BEGIN_RESP";
00160   case END_RESP:
00161     return (const char*)"END_RESP";
00162   default:                              // Fixed typo for default
00163     return (const char*)"invalid phase";
00164   }
00165   return (const char*)"";
00166 }
00167 
00168 const char* ml_tlm2_status_to_string(tlm_sync_enum status) {
00169   switch (status) {
00170   case TLM_COMPLETED:
00171     return (const char*)"TLM_COMPLETED";
00172   case TLM_ACCEPTED:
00173     return (const char*)"TLM_ACCEPTED";
00174   case TLM_UPDATED:
00175     return (const char*)"TLM_UPDATED";
00176   default:                          // Fixed typo for default
00177     return (const char*)"invalid status";
00178   }
00179   return (const char*)"";
00180 }
00181 
00182 void ml_tlm2_transaction_mapping_update_error(const string &socket_name, 
00183                                                const string &intf_name, 
00184                                                tlm_phase phase) {
00185   string err_str = "ML-TLM2 non-blocking transaction did not follow the rules of the TLM2 standard.\n'" +  
00186     intf_name + "' of '" + socket_name + "' was called with phase '" + ml_tlm2_phase_to_string(phase) + 
00187     "', but the transaction was not first sent on \nthe forward path with the BEGIN_REQ phase, or already returned on the forward \n\
00188 path with the END_RESP phase or the TLM_COMPLETED status.\n";
00189   SC_REPORT_FATAL("Error", err_str.c_str());
00190 }
00191 
00192 void ml_tlm2_transaction_mapping_remove_error(const string &socket_name, 
00193                                                const string &intf_name, 
00194                                                tlm_phase phase, 
00195                                                tlm_sync_enum status) {
00196   string err_str = "ML-TLM2 non-blocking transaction did not follow the rules of the TLM2 standard.\n'" +  
00197     intf_name + "' of '" + socket_name + "' returned with phase '" + ml_tlm2_phase_to_string(phase) + "' and status '" + 
00198     ml_tlm2_status_to_string(status) + "', but the transaction was not first sent on \nthe forward path with the BEGIN_REQ phase, " + 
00199     "or already returned on the forward \npath with the END_RESP phase or the TLM_COMPLETED status.\n";
00200   SC_REPORT_FATAL("Error", err_str.c_str());
00201 }
00202 
00203 void ml_tlm2_transaction_mapping_mm_error(const string &socket_name) {
00204   string err_str = "ML-TLM2 non-blocking transaction does not have a memory manager, and therefore cannot be mapped.\n Socket '" +  
00205     socket_name + "' has transaction mapping enabled in its connection method, but no memory manager exists for the transaction.\n " +
00206     "This is not supported.\n";
00207   SC_REPORT_FATAL("Error", err_str.c_str());  
00208 }

00211 
00212 uvm_ml_packer & operator << (uvm_ml_packer &p, tlm_generic_payload * tlm_gp) { 
00213   if (tlm_gp == NULL) { 
00214     p.pack_null(); 
00215   } 
00216   else { 
00217     uvm_ml_class_companion * companion = uvm_ml_class_company::get_companion(typeid(*tlm_gp)); 
00218     p.pack_obj_header(companion->get_type_name());              
00219     ml_tlm2_gp_companion::pack_tlm_generic_payload(p, tlm_gp);  
00220     companion->uvm_ml_automation(&p, tlm_gp, NULL, ML_TLM2_PACK_OP); 
00221   } 
00222   return p; 
00223 } 
00224 
00225 uvm_ml_packer & operator << (uvm_ml_packer &p, const tlm_generic_payload & tlm_gp) { 
00226   uvm_ml_class_companion * companion = uvm_ml_class_company::get_companion(typeid(tlm_gp)); 
00227   //assert (companion != NULL);
00228   if(companion == NULL) {
00229     UVM_ML_SC_REPORT_ERROR("UVM-SC adapter: packing failed due to unidentified type","");
00230   } else {
00231       p.pack_obj_header(companion->get_type_name());
00232       ml_tlm2_gp_companion::pack_tlm_generic_payload(p, &tlm_gp);       
00233       companion->uvm_ml_automation(&p, (tlm_generic_payload *) &tlm_gp, NULL, ML_TLM2_PACK_OP); 
00234   }
00235 
00236   return p; 
00237 }
00238 
00239 uvm_ml_packer & operator >> (uvm_ml_packer &p, tlm_generic_payload *& tlm_gp) { 
00240   tlm_gp = (tlm_generic_payload *) p.unpack_obj_header();
00241   if (tlm_gp) { 
00242     uvm_ml_class_companion * companion = uvm_ml_class_company::get_companion(typeid(*tlm_gp)); 
00243     ml_tlm2_gp_companion::unpack_tlm_generic_payload(p, tlm_gp);        
00244     companion->uvm_ml_automation(&p, tlm_gp, NULL, ML_TLM2_UNPACK_OP); 
00245   } 
00246   return p; 
00247 }
00248 
00249 uvm_ml_packer & operator << (uvm_ml_packer &p, tlm_extension_base * ext) { 
00250   uvm_ml_class_companion * companion = uvm_ml_class_company::get_companion(typeid(*ext)); 
00251   p.pack_obj_header(companion->get_type_name());                
00252   companion->uvm_ml_automation(&p, ext, NULL, ML_TLM2_PACK_OP); 
00253   return p; 
00254 } 
00255 
00256 uvm_ml_packer & operator >> (uvm_ml_packer &p, tlm_extension_base *& ext) { 
00257   ext = (tlm_extension_base *) p.unpack_obj_header();
00258   if (ext) { 
00259     uvm_ml_class_companion * companion = uvm_ml_class_company::get_companion(typeid(*ext)); 
00260     companion->uvm_ml_automation(&p, ext, NULL, ML_TLM2_UNPACK_OP);
00261   } 
00262   return p; 
00263 }
00264 
00266 
00267 void ml_tlm2_pack(
00268   const tlm_generic_payload & val,
00269   uvm_ml_packed_obj* p
00270 ) {
00271   //uvm_ml_packer pkr;
00272   static uvm_ml_packer& pkr = uvm_ml_packer::get_the_uvm_ml_packer();
00273   pkr << val;
00274   int packed_size = pkr.get_remaining_unpacked_bits();
00275   int max_size = uvm_ml::uvm_ml_utils::get_max_bits();
00276   if (packed_size > max_size) {
00277     char msg[1024];
00278     sprintf(msg,"\nuvm_object size is %d\n"
00279             "Max size is %d\n"
00280             "uvm_object type is '%s'\n"
00281             "Consider increasing the maximum size limit with the "
00282             "irun option '-defineall UVM_PACK_MAX_SIZE=<size>'.",
00283             packed_size, max_size, ml_tlm2_class_company::get_type_name(typeid(val)).c_str()
00284            );
00285     UVM_ML_SC_REPORT_ERROR(ML_UVM_SIZE_LIMIT_,msg);
00286   }
00287   pkr.fill_uvm_ml_packed_obj(p);
00288   pkr.reset();
00289 }
00290 
00291 void ml_tlm2_unpack_create(
00292   uvm_ml_packed_obj* p,
00293   tlm_generic_payload*& val
00294 ) {
00295   try {
00296     static uvm_ml_packer& pkr = uvm_ml_packer::get_the_uvm_ml_packer();
00297     pkr.set_from_uvm_ml_packed_obj(p);
00298     pkr >> val;
00299     // check if any unpack error happened;
00300     // only 2 kinds of errors are flagged:
00301     // too few bits or too many bits;
00302     // check for too few bits here, for
00303     // too many bits exception is thrown
00304     // which needs to be caught
00305     if (int rem = pkr.get_remaining_unpacked_bits()) { // implies too few bits
00306       char msg[1024];
00307       sprintf(msg,"\nFewer bits unpacked in SystemC than were packed "
00308               "for this tlm_generic_payload in foreign language. "
00309               "This may be due to a mismatch in class definitions "
00310               "across languages - the SystemC "
00311               "tlm_generic_payload object is smaller in size\n"
00312               "tlm2 transaction type is '%s'\n"
00313               "Number of remaining bits is %d\n",
00314               ml_tlm2_class_company::get_type_name(typeid(*val)).c_str(), rem 
00315              );
00316       SC_REPORT_ERROR(UVM_PACKER_UNPACK_OBJECT_,msg);
00317     }
00318     pkr.reset();
00319   }
00320   // check if "too may bits" error happened
00321   catch( const sc_report& ex ) {
00322     if (strcmp(UVM_PACKER_UNPACK_INDEX_, ex.get_msg_type()) == 0) {
00323       // implies too may bits error
00324         UVM_ML_SC_PRINT_REPORT(ex);
00325       char msg[1024];
00326       sprintf(msg,"\nMore bits unpacked in SystemC than were packed "
00327               "for this uvm_object in foreign language. "
00328               "This may be due to a mismatch in class definitions "
00329               "across languages - the SystemC "
00330               "uvm_object is larger in size\n"
00331               "uvm_object type is '%s'\n",
00332               ml_tlm2_class_company::get_type_name(typeid(*val)).c_str()
00333              );
00334       SC_REPORT_ERROR(UVM_PACKER_UNPACK_OBJECT_,msg);
00335     } else  {
00336       // not the error we are looking for, throw back
00337       throw(ex);
00338     }
00339   }
00340 }
00341 
00342 void ml_tlm2_update_data_from_response(tlm_generic_payload &trans, 
00343                                        tlm_generic_payload &response_gp,
00344                                        string full_socket_name) {
00345   unsigned int length = response_gp.get_data_length();
00346   if (trans.get_data_length() != length) {
00347     string str = full_socket_name + ": " + "data_lengths in request and response transactions are different";
00348     SC_REPORT_FATAL("Error", str.c_str());
00349   }
00350 
00351   if (length > 0) {
00352     if (trans.get_data_ptr() == NULL) {
00353       string str = full_socket_name + ": " + "data pointer in the request transaction is NULL but data_length is not 0";
00354       SC_REPORT_FATAL("Error", str.c_str());
00355     }
00356     if (response_gp.get_data_ptr())
00357       memcpy(trans.get_data_ptr(), response_gp.get_data_ptr(), length);
00358   }
00359 }

00365   uvm_ml_class_company::update_class(typeid(tlm_gp), &tlm_gp, &other);

00387 void ml_tlm2_gp_companion::update(void * target, void * src)
00388 {
00389   update_tlm_generic_payload((tlm_generic_payload *) target, (tlm_generic_payload *) src);
00390   uvm_ml_automation(NULL, target, src, ML_TLM2_BW_UPDATE_OP);
00391 }
00392 
00393 void ml_tlm2_ext_companion::update(void * ext, void * tlm_gp)
00394 {
00395   tlm_extension_base * other_ext = get_other_ext((tlm_generic_payload *) tlm_gp);
00396   if (other_ext != NULL)
00397     uvm_ml_automation(NULL, ext, other_ext, ML_TLM2_BW_UPDATE_OP);
00398 }

00400 uvm_ml_companion_map_type & uvm_ml_class_company::get_companion_map() 
00401 { 
00402     if (companion_map == NULL)
00403       companion_map = new uvm_ml_companion_map_type();
00404 
00405     return *companion_map; 
00406 }
00407 
00408 bool uvm_ml_class_company::register_class_companion(const type_info & actual_type, uvm_ml_class_companion * c) 
00409 {
00410     uvm_ml_companion_map_type & map = get_companion_map();
00411     if (map[&actual_type] == 0) {
00412         map[&actual_type] = c;
00413         uvm_factory::register_class_creator(c->get_type_name(), c);
00414     } else
00415       delete c; // Otherwise there will be memory leak
00416     
00417     return true; // dummy return value needed to enable the function call in an initializer
00418 }
00419   
00420 uvm_ml_class_companion * uvm_ml_class_company::get_companion(const type_info & actual_type) 
00421 {
00422     uvm_ml_companion_map_type & map = get_companion_map();
00423     uvm_ml_class_companion * c = map[&actual_type];
00424     if (c == NULL) {
00425       string err_str = "Class with type_info.name() " + string(actual_type.name()) + " was not registered via ML_TLM2_GP_BEGIN or ML_TLM2_GP_EXT_BEGIN macro";
00426       SC_REPORT_FATAL("Error", err_str.c_str());
00427     }
00428     return c;
00429 }
00430 
00431 string uvm_ml_class_company::get_type_name(const type_info & actual_type)
00432 {
00433     uvm_ml_class_companion * comp = get_companion(actual_type);
00434     if (comp == NULL) {
00435       string err_str = "Class with type_info.name() " + string(actual_type.name()) + " was not registered via ML_TLM2_GP_BEGIN or ML_TLM2_GP_EXT_BEGIN macro";
00436       SC_REPORT_FATAL("Error", err_str.c_str());
00437       return "";
00438     }
00439     return comp->get_type_name();
00440 }
00441 
00442 void uvm_ml_class_company::update_class(const type_info & actual_type, void * target, void * src)
00443 {
00444     uvm_ml_class_companion * comp = get_companion(actual_type);
00445     if (comp == NULL) {
00446       string err_str = "Class with type_info.name() " + string(actual_type.name()) + " was not registered via ML_TLM2_GP_BEGIN or ML_TLM2_GP_EXT_BEGIN macro";
00447       SC_REPORT_FATAL("Error", err_str.c_str());
00448       return;
00449     }
00450     comp->update(target, src);
00451 }
00452 
00453 ml_tlm2_ext_companion * ml_tlm2_class_company::get_ext_companion(const type_info & actual_type) 
00454 {
00455     uvm_ml_class_companion * comp = get_companion(actual_type);
00456     ml_tlm2_ext_companion * ret = dynamic_cast<ml_tlm2_ext_companion *>(comp);
00457     return ret;
00458 }
00459 
00460 void ml_tlm2_gp_companion::update_tlm_generic_payload(tlm_generic_payload * tlm_gp, tlm_generic_payload * other) 
00461 {  
00462   // update response status
00463   tlm_gp->set_response_status(other->get_response_status());
00464 
00465   // update dmi
00466   tlm_gp->set_dmi_allowed(other->is_dmi_allowed());
00467 
00468   // update extensions   
00469   for (int j = 0; j < uvm_gp_wrapper_base::extensions_size(tlm_gp); j++) {
00470     tlm_extension_base * ext = tlm_gp->get_extension(j);
00471     if (ext) {
00472       ml_tlm2_ext_companion * ext_comp = ml_tlm2_class_company::get_ext_companion(typeid(*ext));
00473       ext_comp->update(ext, other);
00474     }
00475   }  
00476 }
00477 
00478 void ml_tlm2_gp_companion::pack_tlm_generic_payload(uvm_ml_packer& p, const tlm_generic_payload * tlm_gp) 
00479 {
00480     tlm_extension_base * i_extension;
00481     unsigned int         i_extension_num = 0;
00482   
00483     if(tlm_gp == NULL) {
00484         SC_REPORT_FATAL("Error", "pack_tlm_generic_payload called with tlm_gp NULL");
00485         return;
00486     }
00487 
00488     p << tlm_gp->get_address() << tlm_gp->get_command();
00489 
00490     unsigned int len = tlm_gp->get_data_length();
00491     unsigned char * data_ptr = tlm_gp->get_data_ptr();
00492     if ((data_ptr == NULL) && (len > 0)) {
00493         SC_REPORT_FATAL("Error", "inconsistent tlm_generic_payload transaction: data pointer is NULL and data length is not 0");
00494         return;
00495     }
00496 
00497     p << len;
00498     for (unsigned j = 0; j < len; j++) {
00499       p << data_ptr[j];
00500     }
00501     p << len << tlm_gp->get_response_status();
00502 
00503     p << tlm_gp->is_dmi_allowed();
00504   
00505     p << tlm_gp->get_byte_enable_length();
00506     for (unsigned j = 0; j < tlm_gp->get_byte_enable_length(); j++) {
00507       p << (tlm_gp->get_byte_enable_ptr())[j];
00508     }
00509   
00510     p << tlm_gp->get_byte_enable_length() << tlm_gp->get_streaming_width();
00511     for (int j = 0; j < uvm_gp_wrapper_base::extensions_size(tlm_gp); j++) {
00512       if (tlm_gp->get_extension(j))
00513         i_extension_num++;
00514     }
00515     p << i_extension_num;
00516     for (int j = 0; j < uvm_gp_wrapper_base::extensions_size(tlm_gp); j++) {
00517       i_extension = tlm_gp->get_extension(j);
00518       if (i_extension) {
00519         // Size does not count the actual extensions
00520         p << i_extension;
00521       }
00522     }
00523 }
00524 
00525 void ml_tlm2_gp_companion::unpack_tlm_generic_payload(uvm_ml_packer& p, tlm_generic_payload * tlm_gp) 
00526 {
00527     sc_dt::uint64        i_m_address;
00528     int                  i_m_command;
00529     unsigned char*       i_m_data = 0;
00530     unsigned int         i_m_length;
00531     int                  i_m_response_status;
00532     bool                 i_m_dmi;
00533     unsigned char*       i_m_byte_enable = 0;
00534     unsigned int         i_m_byte_enable_length;
00535     unsigned int         i_m_streaming_width;
00536   
00537     unsigned int         length;
00538     unsigned int         i_extensions_size;
00539     tlm_extension_base * i_extension;
00540     stringstream msg;
00541   
00542     p >> i_m_address;
00543     tlm_gp->set_address(i_m_address);
00544   
00545     p >> i_m_command;
00546     tlm_gp->set_command(tlm_command(i_m_command));
00547   
00548     p >> length;
00549     if (length)
00550       i_m_data = new unsigned char [length];
00551     for (unsigned j = 0; j < length; j++)
00552       p >> i_m_data[j];
00553     tlm_gp->set_data_ptr(i_m_data);
00554   
00555     p >> i_m_length;
00556     msg << "do_unpack called with data length " << length << " different from m_length " << i_m_length;
00557     if(length != i_m_length) SC_REPORT_FATAL("Error", msg.str().c_str());
00558     tlm_gp->set_data_length(i_m_length);
00559   
00560     p >> i_m_response_status;
00561 
00562     p >> i_m_dmi;
00563 
00564     tlm_gp->set_response_status(tlm_response_status(i_m_response_status));
00565   
00566     p >> i_m_byte_enable_length;
00567     if (i_m_byte_enable_length)
00568       i_m_byte_enable = new unsigned char [i_m_byte_enable_length];
00569     for (unsigned j = 0; j < i_m_byte_enable_length; j++)
00570       p >> i_m_byte_enable[j];
00571     tlm_gp->set_byte_enable_ptr(i_m_byte_enable);
00572   
00573     p >> i_m_byte_enable_length;
00574     tlm_gp->set_byte_enable_length(i_m_byte_enable_length);
00575   
00576     p >> i_m_streaming_width;
00577     tlm_gp->set_streaming_width(i_m_streaming_width);
00578   
00579     p >> i_extensions_size;
00580   
00581     i_extension = 0;
00582   
00583     for (unsigned int j = 0; j < i_extensions_size; j++) {
00584       p >> i_extension;
00585       if (i_extension) {
00586         unsigned int id = ml_tlm2_class_company::get_ext_companion(typeid(*i_extension))->get_ext_id(i_extension);
00587         tlm_gp->set_auto_extension(id, i_extension);
00588       }
00589     }
00590 }
00591 
00592 void ml_tlm2_gp_companion::clear(const type_info & actual_type, tlm_generic_payload * tlm_gp)
00593 {
00594   tlm_gp->free_all_extensions();
00595   if (tlm_gp->get_data_ptr()) {
00596     delete [] tlm_gp->get_data_ptr();
00597     tlm_gp->set_data_ptr(NULL);
00598   }
00599   if (tlm_gp->get_byte_enable_ptr()) {
00600     delete [] tlm_gp->get_byte_enable_ptr();
00601     tlm_gp->set_byte_enable_ptr(NULL);
00602   }
00603   uvm_ml_class_companion * comp = uvm_ml_class_company::get_companion(actual_type);
00604   if (comp == NULL) {
00605     string err_str = "Class with type_info.name() " + string(actual_type.name()) + " was not registered via ML_TLM2_GP_BEGIN or ML_TLM2_GP_EXT_BEGIN macro";
00606     SC_REPORT_FATAL("Error", err_str.c_str());
00607     return;
00608   }
00609   comp->uvm_ml_automation(NULL, tlm_gp, NULL, ML_TLM2_DELETE_OP);
00610 }
00611 
00612 void ml_tlm2_analysis_export_connector_base::write_bitstream(unsigned stream_size, void * stream) {
00613     uvm_ml_packed_obj& vt = uvm_ml_utils::get_static_mlupo(); 
00614     uvm_ml_utils::fill_mlupo(vt,stream_size,stream);
00615 
00616     write(vt);
00617 }
00618 
00619 }
